attributes.action: Stop the unfair proposal that Councils are considering raising Council Tax or move property into another banding if the owner has made improvments to it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been proposed councils may raise or move your property into a higher council tax banding if the owner makes inprovements to the property.  We believe this to be grossly unfair as why should people be taxed further for  spending their own money for making improvements to their homes and property.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
